Longstrider.name: Longstrider
Longstrider.flavor: You have an uncanny knack for being in the right place at the right time.

Blade Cascade.name: Blade Cascade
Blade Cascade.flavor: Time seems to slow down as your weapons fall upon your hapless foes like rain from an ominous sky.
Blade Cascade.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Blade Cascade.attack: Strength vs. AC. Alternate main and off-hand weapon attacks until you miss or until you make five attacks .As soon as an attack misses, this power ends.

Two-Wolf Pounce.name: Two-Wolf Pounce
Two-Wolf Pounce.flavor: You set upon a foe with weapons bared, then weave to the side and deal a wound to another adversary.
Two-Wolf Pounce.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Two-Wolf Pounce.special: You can shift 2 squares before making this attack.
Two-Wolf Pounce.attack: Strength vs. AC, two attacks (main weapon and off-hand weapon)
Two-Wolf Pounce.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (main weapon) and 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (off-hand weapon).
Two-Wolf Pounce.effect: After attacking the primary target, you can shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Two-Wolf Pounce.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Twin Strike.name: Twin Strike
Twin Strike.flavor: If the first attack doesn't kill it, the second one might.
Twin Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Twin Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Twin Strike.onHit:
1[W] damage per attack.
Increase damage to 2[W] at 21st level.

Spray of Arrows.name: Spray of Arrows
Spray of Arrows.flavor: You fire repeatedly with a short draw, showering arrows at each enemy in front of you.
Spray of Arrows.requirement: You must be wielding a ranged weapon.
Spray of Arrows.target: Each enemy in the blast you can see

Great Ram Arrow.name: Great Ram Arrow
Great Ram Arrow.flavor: You loose an arrow that pierces your foe, hurls him back, and knocks him off his feet.
Great Ram Arrow.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. In addition, you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier, and it is knocked prone.
Great Ram Arrow.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square and it is knocked prone.

Open the Range.name: Open the Range
Open the Range.flavor: You keep your distance from an approaching adversary, backpedaling easily away from him.
Open the Range.trigger: An enemy moves adjacent to you
Open the Range.effect: You can shift 1 square and then move a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. You can’t end your move adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Cruel Cage of Steel.name: Cruel Cage of Steel
Cruel Cage of Steel.flavor: You move swiftly around your enemies, weaving back and forth and delivering a vicious slash with each soft step.
Cruel Cage of Steel.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Cruel Cage of Steel.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (first attack; main), 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (second attack; off-hand), and 1[W] + Strength modifier (third attack; main). A target hit once is dazed until the end of your next turn. A target hit twice is stunned until the end of your next turn. A target hit three times is weakened and stunned until the end of your next turn.
Cruel Cage of Steel.onMiss: Half damage per attack, and the target is not dazed, stunned, or weakened.
Cruel Cage of Steel.effect: After the first attack and after the second attack, you can shift 1 square.

Safe Stride.name: Safe Stride
Safe Stride.flavor: You deftly maneuver around your foes as the battle rages on.
Safe Stride.effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Momentary Respite.name: Momentary Respite
Momentary Respite.flavor: Amid the chaos of combat, you’re able to calm yourself for an instant and recover from a harmful effect.
Momentary Respite.effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and make a saving throw. You are no longer marked by any enemy.

Attacks on the Run.name: Attacks on the Run
Attacks on the Run.flavor: Without breaking stride, you make two attacks against a single foe or two different targets.
Attacks on the Run.attack: You can move your speed. At any point during your move, you can make two Strength vs. AC attacks with a melee weapon or two Dexterity vs. AC attacks with a ranged weapon.
Attacks on the Run.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack.

Sudden Strike.name: Sudden Strike
Sudden Strike.flavor: You hold your weapons blade-down and slash your foe across the face with one of them. As he spins away and drops his guard, you roll to one side, spring to your feet, and plunge your other blade into his back.
Sudden Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Sudden Strike.effect: You shift 1 square and make a secondary attack against the target.
Sudden Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (main weapon), and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Close Quarters Shot.name: Close Quarters Shot
Close Quarters Shot.flavor: Though menaced by fangs and claws, you calmly unload an arrow into the creature’s gaping maw—mere inches from your outstretched arm.
Close Quarters Shot.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Knockdown Shot.name: Knockdown Shot
Knockdown Shot.target: One creature of your size or smaller
Knockdown Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Hunter’s Shot.name: Hunter’s Shot
Hunter’s Shot.flavor: You draw a bead on your chosen opponent and take the shot.
Hunter’s Shot.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If the target is your quarry, the attack hits if the attack roll hits the target’s AC or Reflex.

Evade the Blow.name: Evade the Blow
Evade the Blow.flavor: When your enemy launches his attack, you leap out of the way, leaving your foe to hit nothing but air.
Evade the Blow.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Evade the Blow.effect: Shift 1 square away from the enemy.

Forest Ghost.name: Forest Ghost
Forest Ghost.flavor: You vanish into your surroundings with such speed and skill that your enemies can’t even begin to guess where you might be.
Forest Ghost.effect: When it is not your turn, enemies treat you as invisible if you have cover or concealment from them. An enemy still knows the square you occupy if it saw you in that square at any point during a round. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes.

Swirling Leaves of Steel.name: Swirling Leaves of Steel
Swirling Leaves of Steel.flavor: You spin around with blades outstretched, using momentum and skill to slice through enemy defenses.
Swirling Leaves of Steel.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Swirling Leaves of Steel.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Undaunted Stride.name: Undaunted Stride
Undaunted Stride.flavor: You expertly navigate through difficult terrain.
Undaunted Stride.effect: Your movement is not hindered by difficult terrain.

Weave a Web of Steel.name: Weave a Web of Steel
Weave a Web of Steel.flavor: Crossing your blades, you form a defense as solid as a mighty shield, ready to riposte if your enemy isn’t lucky.
Weave a Web of Steel.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Weave a Web of Steel.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Weave a Web of Steel.attack: Strength vs. AC, two attacks (main weapon and off-hand weapon)
Weave a Web of Steel.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage (main weapon) and 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (off-hand weapon). If both attacks hit, the target’s attack misses.
Weave a Web of Steel.onMiss: Half damage with your main weapon, and no damage with your off-hand weapon.

Weave Through the Fray.name: Weave Through the Fray
Weave Through the Fray.flavor: You dodge through the thick of the fight, denying your foes a chance to pin you down in one spot.
Weave Through the Fray.trigger: An enemy moves adjacent to you
Weave Through the Fray.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Yield Ground.name: Yield Ground
Yield Ground.flavor: Even as your foe connects, you leap backward, out of the way of further harm.
Yield Ground.trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee attack
Yield Ground.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. Gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Fox's Cunning.name: Fox's Cunning
Fox's Cunning.flavor: Using the momentum from your enemy’s blow to fall back or slip to one side, you make a sudden retaliatory attack as he stumbles to regain his composure
Fox's Cunning.trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against you
Fox's Cunning.attack: You can shift 1 square, then make a basic attack against the enemy.
Fox's Cunning.special: Gain a power bonus to your basic attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Claws of the Griffon.name: Claws of the Griffon
Claws of the Griffon.flavor: Your steel blades flash menacingly as you taunt your foes with parries and cut deep wounds into their flesh.
Claws of the Griffon.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Claws of the Griffon.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Claws of the Griffon.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (main weapon) and 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (off-hand weapon).

Jaws of the Wolf.name: Jaws of the Wolf
Jaws of the Wolf.flavor: You use your weapons to hedge in your foe and trick him into exposing a weak spot, at which point you strike.
Jaws of the Wolf.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Jaws of the Wolf.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks

Thundertusk Boar Strike.name: Thundertusk Boar Strike
Thundertusk Boar Strike.flavor: You attack twice, causing your foes to stagger backward.
Thundertusk Boar Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Thundertusk Boar Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Thundertusk Boar Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack. With each hit, you push the target 1 square. If both attacks hit the same target, you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

Pinning Strike.name: Pinning Strike
Pinning Strike.flavor: With a well-aimed attack, you pin your foe to the ground or to a nearby wall.
Pinning Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Pinning Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Pinning Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack. The target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.

Hunter's Bear Trap.name: Hunter's Bear Trap
Hunter's Bear Trap.flavor: A well-placed shot to the leg leaves your enemy hobbled and bleeding.
Hunter's Bear Trap.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Hunter's Bear Trap.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged), and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).
Hunter's Bear Trap.onMiss: Half damage, no ongoing damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Frenzied Skirmish.name: Frenzied Skirmish
Frenzied Skirmish.flavor: You leap into the fray and unleash a torrent of steel upon your unsuspecting foes, staggering them with the ferocity of your attacks.
Frenzied Skirmish.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Frenzied Skirmish.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Frenzied Skirmish.special: Before or after these attacks, you can move your speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
Frenzied Skirmish.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If an attack hits, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit the same target, it is dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn.

Stunning Steel.name: Stunning Steel
Stunning Steel.flavor: You fight past your enemies’ shields and armor and deal nasty cuts that leave them reeling and unable to react.
Stunning Steel.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Stunning Steel.attack: Strength vs. Fortitude (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Stunning Steel.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If one attack hits, the target is immobilized (save ends). If both attacks hit, the target is stunned and immobilized (save ends both).
Stunning Steel.onMiss: Half damage per attack, and the target is not stunned or immobilized.

Confounding Arrows.name: Confounding Arrows
Confounding Arrows.flavor: Your targets won’t know what hit them.
Confounding Arrows.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage per attack. A target hit once is dazed (save ends). A target hit twice is stunned (save ends). A target hit three times is stunned (save ends) and takes +2[W] damage.

Bleeding Wounds.name: Bleeding Wounds
Bleeding Wounds.flavor: Your arrows puncture flesh, and from these wounds blood flows in crimson streams.
Bleeding Wounds.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage per attack, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends). A target hit twice takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). A target hit three times takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends).
Bleeding Wounds.onMiss: Half damage per attack, and no ongoing damage.

Wounding Whirlwind.name: Wounding Whirlwind
Wounding Whirlwind.flavor: Crimson droplets splatter as you slash into all nearby foes.
Wounding Whirlwind.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Wounding Whirlwind.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Wounding Whirlwind.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks per target
Wounding Whirlwind.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If you hit a target with one weapon, it takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). If you hit a target with both weapons, it takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Wounding Whirlwind.onMiss: Half damage per attack, and no ongoing damage.

Sure Shot.name: Sure Shot
Sure Shot.flavor: You line up your shot with meticulous care to strike at your foe’s vital organs.
Sure Shot.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. You can reroll the attack roll but must use the second result.
Sure Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You can reroll each damage die once but must use the second result.

Tiger’s Reflex.name: Tiger’s Reflex
Tiger’s Reflex.flavor: You counter your opponent’s attack with a ferocious strike of your own.
Tiger’s Reflex.effect: You can make a basic attack against an enemy you choose as an immediate interrupt if it attacks you.

Follow-Up Blow.name: Follow-Up Blow
Follow-Up Blow.flavor: You follow every strike with a backhanded swipe that breaks through your enemy’s defenses.
Follow-Up Blow.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Follow-Up Blow.effect: Until the stance ends, when you hit with a melee attack, you can use a free action to make melee basic attack with your off-hand weapon. You can do this once per round, and the off-hand weapon attack takes a -2 penalty to its attack roll.

Careful Attack.name: Careful Attack
Careful Attack.flavor: You study the enemy, looking for a gap in his defenses. Only when you find it do you strike.
Careful Attack.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Careful Attack.attack: Strength + 2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).
Careful Attack.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) at 21st level.

Nimble Strike.name: Nimble Strike
Nimble Strike.flavor: You slink past your enemy’s guard to make your attack, or you make your attack and then withdraw to a more advantageous position.
Nimble Strike.special: Shift 1 square before or after you attack.
Nimble Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

Spikes of the Manticore.name: Spikes of the Manticore
Spikes of the Manticore.flavor: You unleash two arrows in rapid succession.
Spikes of the Manticore.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, one attack per target
Spikes of the Manticore.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (first shot) and 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (second shot).

Excruciating Shot.name: Excruciating Shot
Excruciating Shot.flavor: One well-placed arrow leaves your enemy hunched over and howling in pain.
Excruciating Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Excruciating Shot.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not weakened.

Crucial Advice.name: Crucial Advice
Crucial Advice.flavor: You are wise in all things. The sooner your friends realize this, the safer and better off they’ll be.
Crucial Advice.trigger: An ally within range that you can see or hear makes a skill check using a skill in which you’re trained
Crucial Advice.effect: Grant the ally the ability to reroll the skill check, with a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Unbalancing Parry.name: Unbalancing Parry
Unbalancing Parry.flavor: You deftly block your enemy’s strike and turn his momentum against him, causing him to stumble to the side.
Unbalancing Parry.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Unbalancing Parry.effect: You slide the enemy three squares into a square adjacent to you and gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn.

Evade Ambush.name: Evade Ambush
Evade Ambush.flavor: You are the eyes and ears of the group, always alert for the telltale signs of an ambush.
Evade Ambush.effect: At the start of a surprise round in which any allies are surprised, use this power to allow a number of allies equal to your Wisdom modifier to avoid being surprised.

Skilled Companion.name: Skilled Companion
Skilled Companion.flavor: Your allies benefit from the things that you have learned.
Skilled Companion.effect: Choose a skill in which you are trained but the target is not. Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a power bonus to checks with that skill equal to your Wisdom modifier. The target must see or hear you to gain this bonus when making a check.

Expeditious Stride.name: Expeditious Stride
Expeditious Stride.flavor: Like a gazelle, you startle allies and enemies alike with your sudden swiftness.
Expeditious Stride.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your speed increases by 4, and when you shift, you can shift 1 additional square.

Hit the Dirt.name: Hit the Dirt
Hit the Dirt.flavor: You throw yourself to the ground, tumble a safe distance, and spring to your feet no worse for wear.
Hit the Dirt.trigger: You are hit by an area attack or a close attack
Hit the Dirt.effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Cut and Run.name: Cut and Run
Cut and Run.flavor: You attack twice while maneuvering yourself into the most advantageous position possible.
Cut and Run.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Cut and Run.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Cut and Run.special: After the first or the second attack, you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.
Cut and Run.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack.

Evasive Strike.name: Evasive Strike
Evasive Strike.flavor: You confound enemies by weaving through the battlefield unscathed as you make your attacks.
Evasive Strike.special: You can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier either before or after the attack.
Evasive Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Evasive Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

Two-Weapon Eviscerate.name: Two-Weapon Eviscerate
Two-Weapon Eviscerate.flavor: You swing your blades in lethal arcs, dousing the battlefield in your enemy’s blood.
Two-Weapon Eviscerate.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Two-Weapon Eviscerate.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Two-Weapon Eviscerate.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target takes an extra 1d10 damage and is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Disruptive Strike.name: Disruptive Strike
Disruptive Strike.flavor: You thwart an enemy’s attack with a timely thrust of your blade or a quick shot from your bow.
Disruptive Strike.trigger: You or an ally is attacked by a creature
Disruptive Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Disruptive Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The target takes a penalty to its attack roll for the triggering attack equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

Sweeping Whirlwind.name: Sweeping Whirlwind
Sweeping Whirlwind.flavor: You slash and stab at surrounding foes with unbound fury, knocking them off balance with thrusts and leg sweeps.
Sweeping Whirlwind.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Sweeping Whirlwind.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and it is knocked prone.

Hawk's Talon.name: Hawk's Talon
Hawk's Talon.flavor: Like the hawk, you strike with calculated precision.
Hawk's Talon.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged). Gain a power bonus to this attack equal to your Wisdom modifier. Ignore any penalties from cover or concealment (but not superior cover or total concealment).
Hawk's Talon.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

Hit and Run.name: Hit and Run
Hit and Run.flavor: Let the fighter stand toe to toe with the monster. You prefer to make your attack, then withdraw to safer ground.
Hit and Run.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
Hit and Run.effect: If you move in the same turn after this attack, leaving the first square adjacent to the target does not provoke an opportunity attack from the target.

Dire Wolverine Strike.name: Dire Wolverine Strike
Dire Wolverine Strike.flavor: Enemies surround you—much to their chagrin, as you slash them to pieces with the ferocity of a wounded dire wolverine.
Dire Wolverine Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dire Wolverine Strike.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Shadow Wasp Strike.name: Shadow Wasp Strike
Shadow Wasp Strike.flavor: You strike quickly, like a shadow wasp flying out of the darkness, hitting where your foe is most vulnerable.
Shadow Wasp Strike.target: One creature that is your quarry
Shadow Wasp Strike.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (melee) or Dexterity vs. Reflex (ranged)
Shadow Wasp Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

Armor Splinter.name: Armor Splinter
Armor Splinter.flavor: You attack the weak spots in your opponent’s armor, not only dealing damage but also leaving your prey vulnerable to later attacks.
Armor Splinter.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Armor Splinter.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon),  two attacks
Armor Splinter.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If one attack hits, the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit, the target takes a penalty to AC equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

Nimble Defense.name: Nimble Defense
Nimble Defense.flavor: Between strikes, you use both of your weapons to deflect incoming blows.
Nimble Defense.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Nimble Defense.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Nimble Defense.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If you hit with either attack, you gain a power bonus to AC equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

Cheetah’s Rake.name: Cheetah’s Rake
Cheetah’s Rake.flavor: You whirl around with blades outstretched, slashing your foes across the legs and causing them to fall to the ground in mewling heaps.
Cheetah’s Rake.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Cheetah’s Rake.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Cheetah’s Rake.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Triple Shot.name: Triple Shot
Triple Shot.flavor: You launch a volley of three arrows, which streak across the battlefield with whispered threats of oblivion.

Arrow of Vengeance.name: Arrow of Vengeance
Arrow of Vengeance.flavor: You point your bow at the villain who just wounded your friend and loose a vengeful arrow.
Arrow of Vengeance.trigger: A creature within range attacks your ally
Arrow of Vengeance.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, and you gain a power bonus to this attack equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Blade Ward.name: Blade Ward
Blade Ward.flavor: Your enemy strikes, and as you defend yourself with one blade, you drive the other deep into his gullet.
Blade Ward.trigger: A creature makes a melee attack against you
Blade Ward.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target’s attack rolls against you take a penalty equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Hammer Shot.name: Hammer Shot
Hammer Shot.flavor: You test the strength of your bowstring as you pull an arrow back as far as it will go and unleash it upon your unsuspecting foe.
Hammer Shot.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier.

Manticore’s Volley.name: Manticore’s Volley
Manticore’s Volley.flavor: You pepper your foe with arrows.
Manticore’s Volley.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage per attack. If two attacks hit, deal an extra 1[W] damage. If all three attacks hit, deal an extra 2[W] damage.

Cloak of Thorns.name: Cloak of Thorns
Cloak of Thorns.flavor: You stab and slash enemies that come close to you.
Cloak of Thorns.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Cloak of Thorns.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Cloak of Thorns.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If one attack hits, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit the same target, this penalty worsens to –4.
Cloak of Thorns.effect: If any adjacent creature makes an attack against you and misses before the start of your next turn, make a melee basic attack against it with both your main weapon and your off-hand weapon as an immediate reaction.

Death Rend.name: Death Rend
Death Rend.flavor: You plunge your blades into your opponent and rip them out with the ferocity of a tiger, leaving your prey gasping for life.
Death Rend.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Death Rend.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Death Rend.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target takes an extra 1d10 damage and is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Lightning Shot.name: Lightning Shot
Lightning Shot.flavor: As an enemy reels from a terrible wound, you quickly loose an arrow to finish him off.
Lightning Shot.trigger: One creature you can see has just taken damage
Lightning Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if the target is bloodied.

Hail of Arrows.name: Hail of Arrows
Hail of Arrows.flavor: You launch a barrage of arrows that strike all enemies before you.

Wandering Tornado.name: Wandering Tornado
Wandering Tornado.flavor: You strike your enemies in all directions. Then, like a tornado, you weave through the battlefield and unleash a second onslaught of whirling steel.
Wandering Tornado.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Wandering Tornado.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier, and make another close burst 1 attack (as above).

Split the Tree.name: Split the Tree
Split the Tree.flavor: You fire two arrows at once, which separate in mid-flight to strike two different targets.
Split the Tree.targets: Two creatures within 3 squares of each other
Split the Tree.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. Make two attack rolls, take the higher result, and apply it to both targets.

Two-Fanged Strike.name: Two-Fanged Strike
Two-Fanged Strike.flavor: You sink two arrows or both of your blades into the flesh of your enemy, causing it to howl in pain.
Two-Fanged Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Two-Fanged Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Two-Fanged Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack. If both attacks hit, you deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Splintering Shot.name: Splintering Shot
Splintering Shot.flavor: Your arrow burrows into flesh and shatters, sending splinters of wood deep into the wound.
Splintering Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
Splintering Shot.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a –1 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

Two-in-One Shot.name: Two-in-One Shot
Two-in-One Shot.flavor: The first shot is always the toughest.
Two-in-One Shot.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, two attacks. If the first attack hits, you gain a +5 bonus to the attack roll for the second attack. If the first attack misses, make the second attack normally.

Master of the Hunt.name: Master of the Hunt
Master of the Hunt.flavor: You take careful aim with every shot.
Master of the Hunt.effect: You gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Bloodstorm.name: Bloodstorm
Bloodstorm.flavor: With bow or blades, you rain a series of deadly blows on your opponent.
Bloodstorm.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Bloodstorm.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Bloodstorm.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack.
Bloodstorm.effect: After making these attacks, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Unstoppable Arrows.name: Unstoppable Arrows
Unstoppable Arrows.flavor: You loose a volley of arrows with such force that they skewer several nearby enemies.
Unstoppable Arrows.requirement: You must be wielding a ranged weapon.

Three-in-One Shot.name: Three-in-One Shot
Three-in-One Shot.flavor: If you can hit with the first arrow, the others will follow.
Three-in-One Shot.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, three attacks. If the first attack hits, you gain a +5 bonus to the second and third attack rolls. If the first attack misses, roll the second and third attacks normally.

Off-Hand Strike.name: Off-Hand Strike
Off-Hand Strike.flavor: A weapon in your off-hand allows for a quick attack.
Off-Hand Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

Rapid Volley.name: Rapid Volley
Rapid Volley.flavor: With amazing speed, you unleash a pair of arrows at your enemies.
Rapid Volley.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, one attack per target. If you target one creature, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll. If you target two creatures, you take a –2 penalty to both attack rolls.

Scattering Volley.name: Scattering Volley
Scattering Volley.flavor: Your hail of shots causes your foes to dive for cover, clearing a path for your allies.
Scattering Volley.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, one attack per target. If you target one creature, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll. If you target two creatures, you take a –2 penalty to both attack rolls.
Scattering Volley.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Hammering Volley.name: Hammering Volley
Hammering Volley.flavor: Pulling back on your bow with great effort, you unleash a pair of arrows that slam your foes into the ground.
Hammering Volley.attack: Dexterity vs. Fortitude, one attack per target. If you target one creature, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll. If you target two creatures, you take a –2 penalty to both attack rolls.
Hammering Volley.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Dazing Volley.name: Dazing Volley
Dazing Volley.flavor: You shoot quickly enough to get off one shot with accuracy or two with haste. Either way, you leave struck foes in momentary shock.
Dazing Volley.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, one attack per target. If you target one creature, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll. If you target two creatures, you take a –2 penalty to both attack rolls.
Dazing Volley.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Circling Strike.name: Circling Strike
Circling Strike.flavor: Using the distraction your attack provides, your beast companion finds a better position.
Circling Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
Circling Strike.effect: Before or after the attack, your beast companion can shift 1 square.

Predator Strike.name: Predator Strike
Predator Strike.flavor: Your enemy focuses its attention on you, allowing your beast to attack.
Predator Strike.onHit:
1[B] + beast’s Strength modifier + your Wisdom modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[B] + beast’s Strength modifier + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

Enclose the Prey.name: Enclose the Prey
Enclose the Prey.flavor: Your beast companion circles your quarry, gaining a better position just before you strike.
Enclose the Prey.target: One creature designated as your quarry
Enclose the Prey.effect: Before the attack, both you and your beast companion can shift 2 squares.
Enclose the Prey.beast: If your companion is a cat, a spider, or a wolf, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Hunting-Partner Strike.name: Hunting-Partner Strike
Hunting-Partner Strike.flavor: Working with an ally allows you that extra edge.
Hunting-Partner Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you’re flanking the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Singular Shot.name: Singular Shot
Singular Shot.flavor: You single out a foe for a deadly attack.
Singular Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If no creatures are adjacent to the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Synchronized Strike.name: Synchronized Strike
Synchronized Strike.flavor: You command your beast companion to tear into your opponent, opening a gap for you to exploit.
Synchronized Strike.effect: You make a secondary attack against the target.
Synchronized Strike.beast: If your companion is a bear, a boar, a lizard, a raptor, or a snake, the secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Boar Assault.name: Boar Assault
Boar Assault.flavor: Each successful attack against your foe increases your tenacity.
Boar Assault.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Boar Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged), and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Boar Assault.effect: Until the target is reduced to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier each time you hit the target.

Driving the Quarry.name: Driving the Quarry
Driving the Quarry.flavor: You fiercely assault your quarry, and your beast companion compels that same foe forward.
Driving the Quarry.effect: If the target is your quarry, you slide it 2 squares and slide your beast companion 2 squares, ending its movement adjacent to the target. If the target is your quarry and is also bloodied, you instead slide the beast 4 squares.
Driving the Quarry.beast: If your companion is a cat, a raptor, a spider, or a wolf, you can slide it to any square adjacent to the target.

Hunt's End.name: Hunt's End
Hunt's End.flavor: You carefully focus to make your attack spell your target’s end.
Hunt's End.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged). If the target is your quarry, the attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.
Hunt's End.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

Off-Hand Parry.name: Off-Hand Parry
Off-Hand Parry.flavor: You ready your off-hand weapon to deflect incoming attacks.
Off-Hand Parry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Off-Hand Parry.effect: You gain a power bonus to AC equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn or until you attack with your off-hand weapon.

Partnered Savaging.name: Partnered Savaging
Partnered Savaging.flavor: Your beast companion brutalizes the enemy as you slip in for a quick strike.
Partnered Savaging.effect: If the target is your quarry, you can shift 3 squares and make a basic attack against it.

Ferret an Opening.name: Ferret an Opening
Ferret an Opening.flavor: With a keen eye, you use one moment of advantage to create another.
Ferret an Opening.requirement: You must be flanking an enemy.
Ferret an Opening.effect: You gain combat advantage against the flanked enemy until the end of your next turn.

Fox Shift.name: Fox Shift
Fox Shift.flavor: Distracted by your ally, your foe can’t respond effectively to your sly maneuvering.
Fox Shift.trigger: You hit a target with a melee attack and the target is marked by an ally
Fox Shift.effect: You can shift 1 square, and you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against your target’s attacks until the end of your next turn.

Hearten the Beast.name: Hearten the Beast
Hearten the Beast.flavor: With an encouraging shout, you give your beast companion the desire to fight harder.
Hearten the Beast.target: Your beast companion in the burst
Hearten the Beast.effect: The target makes a saving throw.
Hearten the Beast.beast: If the target is a bear or a boar, it gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Hunter's Privilege.name: Hunter's Privilege
Hunter's Privilege.flavor: Your keen senses and uncanny instincts give you an edge over your quarry.
Hunter's Privilege.trigger: You make an initiative check at the beginning of an encounter and your check result is higher than any other combatant’s
Hunter's Privilege.effect: Until the stance ends, you add 3 to the extra damage you deal with Hunter’s Quarry.

Pack Alertness.name: Pack Alertness
Pack Alertness.flavor: Through subtle communications, you and your beast companion act almost as if you share senses.
Pack Alertness.targets: You and your beast companion in the burst
Pack Alertness.effect: The targets each make a Perception check and share the better result. Also, if your beast companion becomes aware of a target, you do as well, and vice versa.
Pack Alertness.beast: If your companion is a cat, a raptor, or a wolf, the targets gain a +2 bonus to the Perception checks.

Beast Latch.name: Beast Latch
Beast Latch.flavor: Your attack diverts your foe’s attention long enough for your beast companion to take hold, hampering your foe and allowing the beast to easily follow.
Beast Latch.beast: If your companion is a bear, a cat, a raptor, a spider, or a snake, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Beast Latch.effect: If the target moves during its next turn, your beast companion can shift to any square adjacent to the target’s new location as a free action. If the target is your quarry, it is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Leonine Surge.name: Leonine Surge
Leonine Surge.flavor: Like a hunting lion, you throw yourself at your enemy in an attempt to land two blows and put your victim down.
Leonine Surge.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Leonine Surge.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target is knocked prone and takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. If both attacks miss, you grant combat advantage to all enemies until the start of your next turn.

Paired Predators.name: Paired Predators
Paired Predators.flavor: Coupling attacks, you and your beast efficiently take it to your enemies.
Paired Predators.effect: Your beast companion can make a melee basic attack against a target within its reach as a free action.
Paired Predators.beast: If your companion is a boar, a lizard, or a wolf, the attacks deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Ruffling Sting.name: Ruffling Sting
Ruffling Sting.flavor: With a scorpion-like jab, you unsettle your opponent enough to gain a momentary advantage.
Ruffling Sting.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Ruffling Sting.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (off-hand weapon). Until the end of your turn, the target grants combat advantage to you for your next melee attack against it.

Thwarting Shot.name: Thwarting Shot
Thwarting Shot.flavor: Your cutting projectile discombobulates your adversary for a moment.
Thwarting Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Adaptive Assault.name: Adaptive Assault
Adaptive Assault.flavor: Your quick attacks might have different results.
Adaptive Assault.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Adaptive Assault.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), two attacks
Adaptive Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack. If both attacks hit the same target, the target either takes ongoing 5 damage or is dazed (save ends either).

Bloodied Frenzy.name: Bloodied Frenzy
Bloodied Frenzy.flavor: Injury, whether yours or your beast companion’s, provokes an instant assault from the beast that leaves your adversary momentarily hobbled.
Bloodied Frenzy.trigger: An enemy bloodies you or your beast companion
Bloodied Frenzy.effect: Before the attack, your beast companion can shift 5 squares.
Bloodied Frenzy.onHit: 2[B] + beast’s Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Close-Combat Shot.name: Close-Combat Shot
Close-Combat Shot.flavor: You punish your enemy for closing with you.
Close-Combat Shot.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you
Close-Combat Shot.special: Using this power doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack from the target.

Lacerating Maul.name: Lacerating Maul
Lacerating Maul.flavor: Opening your quarry up with a decisive attack, you allow your beast companion to tear a wound. The scent of blood eggs the beast on.
Lacerating Maul.beast: If your companion is a bear, a boar, or a lizard, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Lacerating Maul.effect: If the target is your quarry and your beast companion is adjacent to it, the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). Until the ongoing damage ends, the target grants combat advantage to the beast.

Spitting-Cobra Stance.name: Spitting-Cobra Stance
Spitting-Cobra Stance.flavor: You stand ready to launch a quick attack against any foe that menaces you.
Spitting-Cobra Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, you can make a ranged basic attack as an immediate reaction against any enemy within 5 squares of you that moves closer to you.

Tag the Prey.name: Tag the Prey
Tag the Prey.flavor: Your keen hunter’s instinct picks out this foe from the rest.
Tag the Prey.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. This attack ignores the target’s cover but not superior cover.
Tag the Prey.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you designate the target as your quarry until the end of your next turn. If the target was already your quarry, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
Tag the Prey.onMiss: Half damage, and you do not designate the target as your quarry.

Battle Runner.name: Battle Runner
Battle Runner.flavor: You move with astonishing speed, making it hard for your foes to track your movement.
Battle Runner.effect: Until the stance ends, you can run a number of squares equal to your speed + 4, instead of your speed + 2, and you do not grant combat advantage from running.

Boundless Energy.name: Boundless Energy
Boundless Energy.flavor: You call upon your inner strength to persevere.
Boundless Energy.trigger: You roll an Endurance check and dislike the result
Boundless Energy.prerequisite: You must be trained in Endurance.
Boundless Energy.effect: Reroll the Endurance check. You decide whether to make the reroll before the DM announces the result.

Defensive Posture.name: Defensive Posture
Defensive Posture.flavor: Puffing up defensively, your beast rolls with a blow.
Defensive Posture.trigger: Your beast companion is hit by an attack within 20 squares of you
Defensive Posture.target: Your beast companion in the burst
Defensive Posture.effect: The target gains a +4 power bonus to the defense targeted by the attack.
Defensive Posture.beast: If your companion is a bear, a spider, or a snake, the bonus lasts until the start of your next turn.

Invigorate the Beast.name: Invigorate the Beast
Invigorate the Beast.flavor: Your urging pushes your beast companion onward, despite fatigue and injury.
Invigorate the Beast.effect: The target regains hit points as if it had spent a healing surge.
Invigorate the Beast.beast: If your companion is a boar or a lizard, it regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Serpentine Dodge.name: Serpentine Dodge
Serpentine Dodge.flavor: You snake past your enemies, weaving so that they have a hard time making a follow-up attack against you.
Serpentine Dodge.requirement: You must be within 2 squares of at least two enemies.
Serpentine Dodge.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to all defenses equal to the number of enemies you were adjacent to at any time during this shift.

Beast Rush.name: Beast Rush
Beast Rush.flavor: You designate an enemy to your beast companion, and the beast moves toward that enemy as you strike.
Beast Rush.effect: You make a secondary attack against the target.
Beast Rush.beast: If your companion is a boar, a cat, a raptor, or a wolf, the primary attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Biting Volley.name: Biting Volley
Biting Volley.flavor: Two lucky shots find chinks in your target’s armor.
Biting Volley.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex, two attacks. Each attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.

Harried Quarry.name: Harried Quarry
Harried Quarry.flavor: Your attack, coupled with the threat of your beast companion, throws your quarry off balance.
Harried Quarry.effect: If the target is your quarry, it grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
Harried Quarry.beast: If your companion is a bear, a lizard, a spider, or a snake, your attacks against the target deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

Jackal Ploy.name: Jackal Ploy
Jackal Ploy.flavor: Twin strikes harass your enemy, opening a gap for an ally’s attack as you slip away.
Jackal Ploy.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Jackal Ploy.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (main weapon and off-hand weapon). Make two attack rolls—one with each weapon— and use the higher result.
Jackal Ploy.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to an ally of your choice until the start of your next turn. You can then shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Twofold Flinch.name: Twofold Flinch
Twofold Flinch.flavor: You feint with both weapons, taking your adversary aback.
Twofold Flinch.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Twofold Flinch.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Twofold Flinch.onHit: The target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn. If both attacks hit, the penalty is –4.

Caging Strike.name: Caging Strike
Caging Strike.flavor: You box your foe in with one weapon and then open a wound with the other.
Caging Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Caging Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends). If the target is your quarry, it instead takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Caging Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Jarring Salvo.name: Jarring Salvo
Jarring Salvo.flavor: Each shot that hits your enemy knocks it backward.
Jarring Salvo.onHit: 1[W] damage per attack, and you push the target 1 square.
Jarring Salvo.onMiss: Half damage per attack, and no push.

Menacing Cry.name: Menacing Cry
Menacing Cry.flavor: Your beast companion issues a piercing cry, chilling the blood of nearby enemies.
Menacing Cry.onHit: 1d8 + beast’s Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Menacing Cry.beast: If your companion is a bear, a cat, a raptor, or a wolf, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Menacing Cry.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not immobilized.

Passing Ambush.name: Passing Ambush
Passing Ambush.flavor: You appear as if from nowhere, skewer your adversary, and then fade away.
Passing Ambush.target: One creature that is surprised or unaware of your presence
Passing Ambush.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Passing Ambush.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier damage (ranged), and you can shift 2 squares. If you were hidden from the target when you made the attack, you remain hidden if you have any cover or concealment.
Passing Ambush.onMiss: Half damage, and you can shift 1 square. If you were hidden from the target when you made the attack, you can make a Stealth check with a +2 bonus to remain hidden if you have any cover or concealment.

Ranger's Recovery.name: Ranger's Recovery
Ranger's Recovery.flavor: After taking a moment to make a measuring strike and move into a better position, you’re ready for action again.
Ranger's Recovery.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Ranger's Recovery.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).
Ranger's Recovery.effect: Before or after the attack, you can shift half your speed. If you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a ranger encounter attack power you have used during this encounter. Or if you hit your quarry with this attack, you can instead choose to deal 2[W] extra damage.

Companion Emplacement.name: Companion Emplacement
Companion Emplacement.flavor: You move into position, and you order your beast companion to warily do the same.
Companion Emplacement.targets: You and your beast companion in the burst
Companion Emplacement.effect: You can move your speed, and your beast companion can shift its speed.
Companion Emplacement.beast: If your companion is a raptor or a wolf, you can move 1 extra square, and it can shift 1 extra square.

Hunting Party.name: Hunting Party
Hunting Party.flavor: You’re not about to give up with a simple miss.
Hunting Party.effect: Until the stance ends, each time you miss your quarry with an attack, you can choose an ally within 5 squares of the quarry. If that ally hits the quarry before the start of your next turn, the ally’s attack deals extra damage equal to your Hunter’s Quarry damage.

Prime Shift.name: Prime Shift
Prime Shift.flavor: Always in motion, you dart in for the shot before spinning away.
Prime Shift.effect: Until the stance ends, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier as a move action whenever you hit an enemy with a ranged attack that has the bonus from the Prime Shot class feature.

Quick Recovery.name: Quick Recovery
Quick Recovery.flavor: Your quick command allows your beast companion to recover from an ill effect.
Quick Recovery.trigger: Your beast companion receives an effect that a save can end within 20 squares of you
Quick Recovery.target: Your beast companion in the burst
Quick Recovery.effect: The target makes a saving throw against the effect, with a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Shed the Mark.name: Shed the Mark
Shed the Mark.flavor: Your enemies can’t keep track of your fast movements.
Shed the Mark.effect: The marked condition ends, and you can shift 1 square.

Bloodlust Strike.name: Bloodlust Strike
Bloodlust Strike.flavor: You aim for where the blood already flows.
Bloodlust Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Bloodlust Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier damage (ranged).

Herd the Prey.name: Herd the Prey
Herd the Prey.flavor: Nipping at an adversary, your beast forces that foe toward your waiting weapon.
Herd the Prey.onHit: 1[B] + beast’s Strength modifier damage, and your beast companion can shift 2 squares toward you and then pull the target 2 squares. The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Herd the Prey.beast: If your companion is a lizard, a snake, a spider, or a wolf, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Knockdown Pounce.name: Knockdown Pounce
Knockdown Pounce.flavor: Your beast companion hurls itself at your quarry as you make a forceful attack. The combination sends your foe sprawling.
Knockdown Pounce.target: One creature designated as your quarry
Knockdown Pounce.effect: Before the attack, your beast companion can shift its speed.
Knockdown Pounce.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Knockdown Pounce.beast: If your companion is a bear, a boar, a cat, or a raptor, you instead push the target 2 squares.

Off-Hand Diversion.name: Off-Hand Diversion
Off-Hand Diversion.flavor: Your quick off-hand strike leaves your foe open to attacks.
Off-Hand Diversion.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Off-Hand Diversion.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (off-hand weapon), and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the start of your next turn.

Armor-Piercing Shot.name: Armor-Piercing Shot
Armor-Piercing Shot.flavor: You take careful aim at your target’s weak point before unleashing a deadly shot.

Arterial Strike.name: Arterial Strike
Arterial Strike.flavor: The wound you leave seems small, but it bleeds freely.
Arterial Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Arterial Strike.onHit:
2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged), and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Aftereffect: Ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.flavor: Your attack unleashes a torrent of blood, and your beast companion goes into a frenzy.
Blood Frenzy.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your beast companion gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls. In addition, the beast gains 10 temporary hit points.
Blood Frenzy.beast: If your companion is a boar, a lizard, or a spider, it instead gains 20 temporary hit points.

Scent of Fear.name: Scent of Fear
Scent of Fear.flavor: Once your beast companion senses weakness in an opponent, it attacks with ruthless intensity.
Scent of Fear.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target grants combat advantage to your beast companion, and on each of your turns, you can take a minor action to command the beast to make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Steeling Flurry.name: Steeling Flurry
Steeling Flurry.flavor: You whip your weapons around you before dropping back into a defensive posture.
Steeling Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Steeling Flurry.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Steeling Flurry.attack: Strength vs. AC (main) and Strength vs. AC (offhand), two attacks per target
Steeling Flurry.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If you hit at least twice, you gain a +2 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Tracking Shot.name: Tracking Shot
Tracking Shot.flavor: You use this shot to size up your enemy, gaining insight you need for further attacks.
Tracking Shot.effect: Until you hit the target again or until the end of the encounter, you gain a power bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Curving Shot.name: Curving Shot
Curving Shot.flavor: For a moment, it looked like you were going to miss.
Curving Shot.trigger: You miss with a ranged at-will attack

Pack Stealth.name: Pack Stealth
Pack Stealth.flavor: Moving as one, you and your beast companion disappear into the mist.
Pack Stealth.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
Pack Stealth.requirement: You and your beast companion must have cover or concealment.
Pack Stealth.targets: You and your beast companion in the burst
Pack Stealth.effect: The targets become hidden from any enemy that they have cover or concealment against.
Pack Stealth.beast: If your companion is a cat, a spider, or a snake, it can be within 5 squares of you when you use this power.

Shared Healing.name: Shared Healing
Shared Healing.flavor: You and your beast companion draw strength from each other, restoring your vitality.
Shared Healing.targets: You and your beast companion in the burst
Shared Healing.effect: Each target regains hit points as if spending a healing surge.

Stalker's Senses.name: Stalker's Senses
Stalker's Senses.flavor: Your prey can’t hide from you.
Stalker's Senses.effect: Until the stance ends, you take no attack roll penalty because of concealment or total concealment when you attack your quarry.

Wary Shooter.name: Wary Shooter
Wary Shooter.flavor: Your agile shooting style keeps you safe from enemy attacks.
Wary Shooter.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ranged attack you make does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Blade and Fang.name: Blade and Fang
Blade and Fang.flavor: Attacking as one, you and your beast companion tear into an  opponent.
Blade and Fang.effect: Your beast companion makes a secondary attack against the target.
Blade and Fang.beast: If your companion is a bear, a boar, a lizard, or a snake, the secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Blow-Through Assault.name: Blow-Through Assault
Blow-Through Assault.flavor: Your attack flies through the ranks of closely clustered foes, hurting them all.
Blow-Through Assault.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Blow-Through Assault.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Blow-Through Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged), and each enemy adjacent to the target takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Hounding Beast.name: Hounding Beast
Hounding Beast.flavor: Your beast companion darts around an opponent, leaving it hopelessly sidetracked.
Hounding Beast.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target provokes opportunity attacks from you if it shifts or attacks on its next turn.
Hounding Beast.effect: Before or after the attack, your beast companion can shift 1 square. If the beast shifts, the target grants combat advantage to you for other attacks until the end of your next turn.
Hounding Beast.beast: If your companion is a cat, a raptor, a spider, or a wolf, it can shift 1 square both before and after the attack.

Pounding Barrage.name: Pounding Barrage
Pounding Barrage.flavor: You pepper your enemy with a flurry of projectiles, leaving it tottering and unable to move.
Pounding Barrage.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage per attack. If two of the attacks hit, the target takes 1d6 extra damage. If three of the attacks hit, the target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Untamed Outburst.name: Untamed Outburst
Untamed Outburst.flavor: You lash out with your weapons, surprising your enemy with your wildness.
Untamed Outburst.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Untamed Outburst.attack: Strength + 2 vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Untamed Outburst.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Claim the Prize.name: Claim the Prize
Claim the Prize.flavor: Taking advantage of your foe’s weakness, you try to land a finishing blow.
Claim the Prize.target: One bloodied creature designated as your quarry
Claim the Prize.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Claim the Prize.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

Dead Stop.name: Dead Stop
Dead Stop.flavor: With a well-timed shot, you bring down a charging adversary, which skids to a halt at your feet.
Dead Stop.trigger: An enemy makes a charge attack against you
Dead Stop.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Dead Stop.onMiss: Half damage, and you don’t knock the target prone.
Dead Stop.special: Using this power doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack from the target.

Driving Offensive.name: Driving Offensive
Driving Offensive.flavor: An initial strike hurls your opponent away from you, and as it stumbles, you heave a sense-rattling chaser after it.
Driving Offensive.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Driving Offensive.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Driving Offensive.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Driving Offensive.effect: Make a ranged secondary attack against the target.
Driving Offensive.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Driving Offensive.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed.

Ferocious Roar.name: Ferocious Roar
Ferocious Roar.flavor: With a terrifying vocalization, your beast sends nearby enemies lurching in panic.
Ferocious Roar.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is pushed 1 square and dazed (save ends).
Ferocious Roar.beast: If your companion is a bear, a cat, a snake, or a wolf, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Ferocious Roar.onMiss: Half damage, the target is pushed 1 square, and the target is not dazed.

Gnawing Assault.name: Gnawing Assault
Gnawing Assault.flavor: Your beast companion clamps down on a foe and rends its flesh.
Gnawing Assault.onHit: 2[B] + beast’s Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Gnawing Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.
Gnawing Assault.effect: If the target was already immobilized and your beast companion began the turn adjacent to it, the target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Threefold Assault.name: Threefold Assault
Threefold Assault.flavor: In a wild onslaught, you unleash three attacks with escalating potential.
Threefold Assault.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Threefold Assault.attack: Strength vs. AC, three attacks (at least one attack with each weapon)
Threefold Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If you hit a target twice, you push it a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. If you hit a target three times, it is also dazed until the end of your next turn.
Threefold Assault.special: If you use this power as a ranged attack, it doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Adamant Recovery.name: Adamant Recovery
Adamant Recovery.flavor: You stay up despite all odds, showing what you’re really made of.
Adamant Recovery.trigger: You are reduced to 0 hit points or fewer
Adamant Recovery.effect: You spend a healing surge and can shift 1 square.

Hunt the Herd.name: Hunt the Herd
Hunt the Herd.flavor: You make prey out of all nearby foes.
Hunt the Herd.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Hunt the Herd.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you designate each target as your quarry and can deal your Hunter’s Quarry damage against each one you hit.

Preternatural Senses.name: Preternatural Senses
Preternatural Senses.flavor: Employing all your senses, you are aware of the unseen and the silent.
Preternatural Senses.prerequisite: You must be trained in Perception.
Preternatural Senses.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain blindsight 5 and a +5 power bonus to Perception checks.

Selfless Sacrifice.name: Selfless Sacrifice
Selfless Sacrifice.flavor: You or your beast companion steps in front of an incoming attack meant for the other.
Selfless Sacrifice.trigger: You or your adjacent beast companion is damaged by an attack
Selfless Sacrifice.targets: You and your beast companion in the burst
Selfless Sacrifice.effect: The target damaged by the triggering attack takes only half of the damage, and the other target takes the remainder. (If both targets were damaged by the triggering attack, one target can take half of the other’s damage.) The target taking the remainder of the other’s damage gains temporary hit points equal to your level.

Wild Dash.name: Wild Dash
Wild Dash.flavor: Your beast companion rushes forward to intercept a threat, or perhaps to flee an attacker.
Wild Dash.trigger: Your beast companion is hit by an attack or an enemy enters a square within 5 squares of you
Wild Dash.effect: Your beast companion can shift its speed.

Chase Down.name: Chase Down
Chase Down.flavor: You knock your adversary to one side, and your beast companion pursues.
Chase Down.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. Your beast companion can shift 4 squares and must end adjacent to the target.
Chase Down.beast: If your companion is a bear, a cat, a raptor, a spider, or a wolf, it can instead shift its speed.

Hobbling Shot.name: Hobbling Shot
Hobbling Shot.flavor: The enemy wobbles from your shot and can move only poorly for a moment.
Hobbling Shot.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the start of your next turn. If the target is your quarry, it is instead immobilized until the start of your next turn.

Nonchalant Collapse.name: Nonchalant Collapse
Nonchalant Collapse.flavor: With your off-hand weapon, you casually send a foe to the floor.
Nonchalant Collapse.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Nonchalant Collapse.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Overwhelming Fury.name: Overwhelming Fury
Overwhelming Fury.flavor: You throw yourself at the enemy, distracting it while your beast companion moves to strike.
Overwhelming Fury.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to your beast companion until the end of your next turn.
Overwhelming Fury.effect: Your beast companion makes a secondary attack against the target.
Overwhelming Fury.beast: If your companion is a boar, a lizard, or a snake, the secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Ambusher's Reaping.name: Ambusher's Reaping
Ambusher's Reaping.flavor: You leap from the shadows, cut down two foes, and then disappear from view.
Ambusher's Reaping.targets: One or two creatures that are surprised or that you are hidden from
Ambusher's Reaping.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), one attack per target
Ambusher's Reaping.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage (melee) or 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier damage (ranged), and you can shift your speed. If you are hidden from the target when you make the attack, you remain hidden if you have any cover or concealment.
Ambusher's Reaping.onMiss: Half damage, and you can shift 1 square. You can make a Stealth check with a +2 bonus to remain hidden if you have any cover or concealment.

Primal Rampage.name: Primal Rampage
Primal Rampage.flavor: In a blur, you and your beast companion leap forward, knocking your foe down.
Primal Rampage.requirement: You and your beast companion must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Primal Rampage.onHit: 2[B] damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Primal Rampage.beast: If your companion is a boar, a cat, a raptor, a lizard, or a spider, the primary attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Primal Rampage.effect: Your beast companion can shift 1 square, and you make a secondary attack against the target.
Primal Rampage.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Pursuit of the Wild Hunt.name: Pursuit of the Wild Hunt
Pursuit of the Wild Hunt.flavor: You nail your adversary and your beast companion follows the scent of faltering prey.
Pursuit of the Wild Hunt.effect: Until the end of the encounter, before you take any actions on each of your turns, you can take a free action to command your beast companion to shift its speed to a space closer or adjacent to the target. In addition, the target provokes an opportunity attack from your beast companion whenever the target shifts or makes an attack that doesn’t include the beast as a target.

Ranger's Resurgence.name: Ranger's Resurgence
Ranger's Resurgence.flavor: With the grace of immortals, you move where you will and strike hard, leaving yourself prepared to make another assault.
Ranger's Resurgence.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Ranger's Resurgence.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).
Ranger's Resurgence.effect: Before or after the attack, you can shift your speed. If you have expended all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a ranger encounter attack power you have used during this encounter. Or if you hit your quarry with this attack, you can instead choose to deal 4[W] extra damage.

True-Eye Shot.name: True-Eye Shot
True-Eye Shot.flavor: You can sometimes hit any target you can see.

Beastly Vise.name: Beastly Vise
Beastly Vise.flavor: Your attack leaves your foe with no idea how to escape its position between you and your beast.
Beastly Vise.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you and your beast companion are both flanking the target, the target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.
Beastly Vise.beast: If your companion is a boar, a cat, a raptor, a spider, or a wolf, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Catch and Drop.name: Catch and Drop
Catch and Drop.flavor: A quick strike from your beast companion sends your opponent stumbling to the ground, and you have no qualms about hitting a downed foe.
Catch and Drop.onHit: 1[B] + beast’s Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Catch and Drop.beast: If your companion is a bear, a lizard, or a snake, it slides the target 1 square.
Catch and Drop.effect: You make a secondary attack against the target.

Unstable Gash.name: Unstable Gash
Unstable Gash.flavor: You leave a wound ready to tear open at the slightest strain.
Unstable Gash.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target attacks or moves more than 1 square before the start of your next turn, it takes 4[W] extra damage.

Five-Missile Dance.name: Five-Missile Dance
Five-Missile Dance.flavor: Moving warily, you launch five projectiles at your opponents, each shot more capable than the last of felling a target.
Five-Missile Dance.target: One, two, three, four, or five creatures
Five-Missile Dance.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage per attack. If you hit a target at least twice, you push it 1 square. If you hit a target at least four times, you also knock it prone. If you hit a target five times, it is also immobilized (save ends).
Five-Missile Dance.effect: You can shift 1 square after each attack.

Huntmaster's Bloodbath.name: Huntmaster's Bloodbath
Huntmaster's Bloodbath.flavor: Your horrific attack strikes a vital center, rapidly spilling your adversary’s life force.
Huntmaster's Bloodbath.attack: Strength vs. Fortitude (melee) or Dexterity vs. Fortitude (ranged)
Huntmaster's Bloodbath.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage or 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 20 damage (save ends).
Huntmaster's Bloodbath.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Huntmaster's Mauling.name: Huntmaster's Mauling
Huntmaster's Mauling.flavor: You slice the flesh, and your beast companion tears it open.
Huntmaster's Mauling.effect: Your beast companion makes a secondary attack against the target. If the primary attack bloodied the target, the beast gains combat advantage for the secondary attack.
Huntmaster's Mauling.beast: If your companion is a bear, a snake, or a wolf, the secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Suffering's End.name: Suffering's End
Suffering's End.flavor: Intending to slay your foe one way or another, you strike with deadly force.
Suffering's End.effect: Before the attack, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Twin-Strike Tornado.name: Twin-Strike Tornado
Twin-Strike Tornado.flavor: You move and strike with such speed that your wounded foes are the only proof you moved at all.
Twin-Strike Tornado.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Twin-Strike Tornado.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Shield of Blades.name: Shield of Blades
Shield of Blades.flavor: You defend with one weapon while striking with the other.
Shield of Blades.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Shield of Blades.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Hunter's Teamwork.name: Hunter's Teamwork
Hunter's Teamwork.flavor: You use a nearby ally to gain advantage with your attack.
Hunter's Teamwork.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If two or more allies are adjacent to the target, you gain combat advantage against the target with the attack.
Hunter's Teamwork.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

Dire Bear Maul.name: Dire Bear Maul
Dire Bear Maul.flavor: You draw your foe into a deadly bear hug with both weapons.
Dire Bear Maul.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dire Bear Maul.attack: Strength vs. AC (main) and Strength vs. AC (offhand)
Dire Bear Maul.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target is grabbed. When you sustain the grab, the target takes 1[W] + Strength modifier damage from each weapon. You cannot otherwise attack with your weapons while you sustain the grab. If the target is your quarry, it takes a -2 penalty to escape attempts.

Wolfjaw Blows.name: Wolfjaw Blows
Wolfjaw Blows.flavor: Unwary foes fall as you take advantage of their distraction to hook your weapons into their flesh.
Wolfjaw Blows.effect: Until the stance ends, when you make a melee attack against a target that grants combat advantage to you, the target is knocked prone if you hit.

Bending Branch.name: Bending Branch
Bending Branch.flavor: You resist a foe's attempt to move you, and like a great tree swaying in a storm, you snap back, ready to attack
Bending Branch.trigger: You are pulled, pushed, or slid
Bending Branch.effect: You negate the forced movement. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to your next melee attack roll before the end of your next turn

Plant to the Hilt.name: Plant to the Hilt
Plant to the Hilt.flavor: You embed both of your weapons in your foe and use them as grips to swing that foe around to a new position
Plant to the Hilt.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons
Plant to the Hilt.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice, once with your main weapon and once with your off-hand weapon
Plant to the Hilt.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you. If both attacks hit, the second slide increases to 3 squares

Confusion of Blades.name: Confusion of Blades
Confusion of Blades.flavor: Your twin blades become a whirl of slapping, jabbing, and cutting surfaces
Confusion of Blades.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons
Confusion of Blades.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice, once with your main weapon and once with your off-hand weapon
Confusion of Blades.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. The attack deals 1 extra damage for each enemy adjacent to you

Death Threat.name: Death Threat
Death Threat.flavor: You bring down your quarry and then fix your hunter eyes on another foe
Death Threat.trigger: You reduce your quarry to 0 hit points
Death Threat.effect: Choose one enemy within 5 squares of you. You designate that enemy as your quarry, and you gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn

Lashing Leaves.name: Lashing Leaves
Lashing Leaves.flavor: Your dancing blades cut your foe deep, leaving wounds that are exacerbated by further attacks
Lashing Leaves.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons
Lashing Leaves.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice, once with your main weapon and once with your off-hand weapon
Lashing Leaves.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 2 extra damage whenever it is hit. If both attacks hit, the extra damage equals 1 + your Wisdom modifier

Blood of the Fallen.name: Blood of the Fallen
Blood of the Fallen.flavor: Your triumph is like a balm to you
Blood of the Fallen.trigger: You reduce your quarry to 0 hit points
Blood of the Fallen.effect: You regain hit points equal to your healing surge value + your Strength modifier

Storm in the Trees.name: Storm in the Trees
Storm in the Trees.flavor:
You move like a tempest among the pines, slashing at one foe
and then leaping at another
Storm in the Trees.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons
Storm in the Trees.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice, once with your main weapon and once with your off-hand weapon
Storm in the Trees.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If both attacks hit, you can shift 2 squares and make a melee basic attack against a different creature

Mirror of Steel.name: Mirror of Steel
Mirror of Steel.flavor: With your glittering play of blades, you deflect attacks
Mirror of Steel.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses against melee attacks and ranged attacks while you are wielding two melee weapons

Canopy of Blades.name: Canopy of Blades
Canopy of Blades.flavor: You whirl your blades ferociously, cutting your foe and warding off attacks
Canopy of Blades.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons
Canopy of Blades.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice, once with your main weapon and once with your off-hand weapon
Canopy of Blades.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to 4 if either attack hit and to 6 if both hit

Verdant Silence.name: Verdant Silence
Verdant Silence.flavor: You call on the peace and calm that lives at the heart of the forest, where the Masters of the Verdant Silence meditate
Verdant Silence.effect: You spend a healing surge but regain no hit points. You instead end each effect on you that a save can end

Crashing Blades.name: Crashing Blades
